basics.name: Afsana Mimi
basics.label: Physician
basics.summary: A Bangladeshi-born physician working hard to be one of the best Neuro-Medicine Specialist among the whole world.

work.name: Mymensingh Medical College Hospital
work.summary: Rotating internship with clinical training in Medicine, Surgery, Pediatrics, and Obstetrics & Gynecology, focused on patient care and skill development.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the grand reception of intern doctors.

awards.title: Board Scholarship (SSC)
awards.awarder: Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Cumilla
awards.summary: Awarded a Board Scholarship for outstanding performance in the Secondary School Certificate examination at Ispahani Public School and College, Cumilla.

awards.title: Board Scholarship (HSC)
awards.awarder: Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Dhaka
awards.summary: Awarded a Board Scholarship for exceptional academic results in the Higher Secondary Certificate examination at Adamjee Cantonment College, Dhaka.
